articles.content: Mumbai Indians secured a brilliant win over Gujarat Giants in the Women's Premier League on Tuesday, registering their fifth win on the trot in the edition. With their victory, MI secured a berth in … [+1743 chars]

articles.title: Virat Kohli's Special Gesture - Rediff.com
articles.description: Kohli was seen gifting his India kit to Australia batter Usman Khawaja and wicket-keeper Alex Carey.
articles.content:
